Faq.title: Why we have to switch to Gumroad for payment processing?
Faq.description: Starting February, Google is retiring Web Store payment processing system. To accomadate that we were noticed to migrate our payment processing vendor. We selected Gumroad because it is easy to use and manage for our users as well as for our managment purposes.

Faq.title: Does extension guarantees that all orders will be booked?
Faq.description: No. Auto Book feature is designed to automate clicks. It will guarantee that 'Book' and 'Confirm' buttons will be auto clicked when new load appears. However, there could be potential issues and system failures when booking an order which extension does not have control over such as 'Order has been modified', 'Order does not exist anymore', 'Failed to fetch' etc. Anytime extension tries to book a an order and fails, look at the lower right side of the dashboard for a reason to failure.

Faq.title: When I try to add the extension there is a 'Price not available' message instead of buy button. What to do?
Faq.description: When you encounter this issue, simply change the location to United States from settings icon located right before your email address on top right.

Faq.title: When there is a change in Relay Website, how long it will take the extension to retrofit those changes?
Faq.description: When Amazon Relay updates the site there could be possible issues with the extension. We usually resolve those issues right away, but every change to the extension needs to go through compliance review process with google which varies from few days to weeks. We will do our best to communicate those changes through our channels to keep the users updated.

Faq.title: Auto Book missed some orders, what should I do?
Faq.description: Again, extension does not guarantee that all orders will be booked without fail. There are quite a few reasons for that to happen which we do not have control over.

Faq.title: Can you increase the refresh rate to more than five?
Faq.description: Update per second is relative to response we get from Amazon servers. Every refresh needs at least 200 milliseconds to resolve. That is why you see loading indicator on the screen. Increasing speed will cause loads to fail to appear on the board. We are working on potential solutions to overcome this. Thank you for the patience.

Faq.title: Can I use Relay Auto Booker in different machines at the same time and different Relay account?
Faq.description: Extension is tied to the google account which was used to buy the extension. To use the extension in different machine, just login with that account. Extension can be used simultaneously and does not have any relations to relay account. So it can be used with multiple Relay accounts.

Faq.title: How can I install the extension?
Faq.description: For how to install, please follow this link How to install the extension.

Faq.title: How does the Max Stop feature works?
Faq.description: Think about this as a limiting the amount of stops. Example, if Max Stop is set to 3, Auto Book and Highlight will ignore loads more than 3 stops.

Faq.title: What happens when there are not any loads but similar matches are available?
Faq.description: Extension will ignore loads under 'Similar Matches'.

Faq.title: What if I do not need Auto Book feature?
Faq.description: You can certainly use it as a refresher, Auto Book is just one feature.

Faq.title: Does extension work on non active tab?
Faq.description: No. It only works on a Active Tab. However, you can have multiple instance of browsers open so you can have multiple Active Tabs at the same time.

Faq.title: Where can I see the extension in Action?
Faq.description: You can find product demonstration in our youtube channel.

Faq.title: How to cancel the subscription?
Faq.description: You should have received receipt from Gumroad. There is a Manager Membership link which takes you to Subscription page.
